dataset_info.description: Sample dataset for LPU Query Chatbot development

entries.original_query: How to apply for duplicate ID card?
entries.normalized_query: how to apply for duplicate id card
entries.answer: Visit Block 32, Admin Section with your student ID proof and ₹200 fee. Processing takes 2 working days. Bring passport-size photo and filled application form.

entries.original_query: How do I check my mid-term marks in UMS?
entries.normalized_query: how to check mid term marks in ums
entries.answer: Login to UMS → Academics → Evaluation → Marks Summary. Select the relevant semester and click on 'View Mid-term Marks'. Contact your department if marks are not visible.

entries.original_query: What's the process for hostel room change?
entries.normalized_query: what is the process for hostel room change
entries.answer: Submit room change request form at hostel warden's office with valid reason (medical/academic). Pay ₹500 processing fee. Approval takes 3-5 working days depending on availability.

entries.original_query: When will the end semester exams start?
entries.normalized_query: when will end semester exams start
entries.answer: End semester exams typically start in the first week of December for odd semesters and first week of May for even semesters. Check official LPU academic calendar on website for exact dates.

entries.original_query: How to apply for scholarship in LPU?
entries.normalized_query: how to apply for scholarship in lpu
entries.answer: Apply through LPU Connect → Financial Aid → Scholarship Portal. Upload required documents (income certificate, academic records). Deadline for merit-based scholarships is usually within 30 days of admission.
Central Library: 8:00 AM to 9:00 PM (Monday to Saturday), 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (Sunday). Department libraries: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM. Extended hours during exam periods.

entries.original_query: How to get internship assistance from placement cell?
entries.normalized_query: how to get internship assistance from placement cell
entries.answer: Register on LPU Connect → Placement Portal → Internship Section. Upload resume and complete profile. Attend placement cell orientation. Active students receive internship opportunities via email and portal notifications.

entries.original_query: What is the fee payment deadline for this semester?
entries.normalized_query: what is the fee payment deadline for this semester
entries.answer: Fee payment deadline is typically 15 days before the start of semester. Late payment attracts 5% penalty per week. Payment options: online through LPU Connect, bank deposit, or fee counter at Block 4.

entries.original_query: How to join student clubs at LPU?
entries.normalized_query: how to join student clubs at lpu
entries.answer: Attend Club Fair in first week of semester or visit Student Affairs office in Block 15. Fill registration form and pay ₹100 membership fee. Most clubs meet weekly. Check LPU Connect for club schedules.

entries.original_query: Where is the medical centre and what are its hours?
entries.normalized_query: where is the medical centre and what are its hours
entries.answer: Medical Centre is located near Block 8. Open 24/7 for emergencies. OPD hours: 9:00 AM to 6:00 PM (Monday to Saturday). Free basic medical services for all students with valid ID card.
